body.intro: Please allow me to introduce myself

about.title: Who am I ?
about.subTitle: My name is Brecht, a 25 year old developer from Belgium
about.p1: Studying graphic design in college made me grow curious about web development. One of our subjects involved making layouts for fictional companies with Adobe DreamWeaver and jQuery 2.2. I noticed webdesign and webservices had (and have) lots of potential so I made a switch to IT.
about.p2: As a step-up into the world of IT I started with an associate degree in network engineering with which I could start at the coding bootcamp BeCode. Here I learned the very basics of web development and met a lot of inspiring people.

motivate.title: Why me ?
motivate.p1: Before starting as a developer I already had some experience as a network engineer. I liked coding better as it consists of dealing various challenges involving critical thinking & problem solving. Since starting out I managed to learn quite a lot. Using these new skills I made my portfolio website and this motivation letter with GatsbyJS.
motivate.p2: On the side I like to work out some ideas for local businesses (fictional and existing) when they lack a webpage or service. This way I built a GatsbyJS site for a local record store in Genk.
motivate.p3: Even after finishing the BeCode coding bootcamp I am motivated to code and learn every day. Udemy, Code with Mosh and Fireship.io are my go-to platforms if I want to learn new subjects or if I am stuck on some problem.
motivate.outro: After a detour I feel like I am on the right path to start my career as a frontend developer. My goal is to become the best developer I can be.

company.title: Why Markedeer ?
company.subTitle: Oh deer!
company.p1: I firmly believe in digitalisation and the enormous potential it possesses, this is why Markedeer caught my eye. A dynamic organization which focusses on delivering quality digital products and concurrently provides an environment for it's developers to learn and share skills.
company.p2: The position as frontend developer at Markedeer has everything I have been looking for.
